name: CAE Dallas Training Center
about: CAE Dallas Training Center, located at the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, is the largest corporate aviation training facility in the world, spanning 426,000 square feet. This state-of-the-art facility offers pilot, maintenance, and flight crew training with 36 FAA Level C and D business aircraft simulators. Our experienced instructors, who are type-rated and operationally-experienced, deliver custom-tailored training solutions. The center includes fully equipped classrooms, an aviation resource centre, and a dining room, ensuring a comprehensive and seamless training experience. With unparalleled customer service, CAE Dallas Training Center is the premier choice for business aviation training, providing top-notch education and simulation technology to elevate your aviation skills.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Computerized Testing
Ground School
Simulator
Airline Transport Pilot ATP"]
